Reviews.Title: No Regrets
Reviews.Author: TeamBalto
Reviews.Content: I was cautious when I bought this TV from Target. (I had bought a Polaroid TV from Target and it died on me two months later). Anyways, this TV was well worth the purchase. The setup is easy and the screen is amazing. But the feature that really blew me away was the sound. It's crisp, clear, and does not make fuzzy noises. Sure, it's not a Dolby Surround Sound System, but you won't be disappointed either.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, easy to set up
Reviews.Author: Mary C. Rountree "Virginia Lady"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace a 1992 portable TV that bit the dust. I am not into gadgets, accessories, games, etc, just wanted a new really nice HD TV. This is perfect. it arrived on time, and it was super easy to set up. There is nothing tricky or iffy. Direct TV came out and set up the HD for me and WOW. I can count the blades of grass and even see the pores in human skin. the TV is also lightweight and easy to carry and move around, quite unlike the old "portable". Flat screen design is great; no wasted space, more flexibility for where to put it. I think this is a great buy for senior citizens like me who just want an affordable high quality TV pure and simple.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Quality and Great Value
Reviews.Author: Jill
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a high-quality mid-sized flat-screen HDTV for our bedroom and this 24" Vizio caught our attention.  At $198 and with such great reviews regarding the picture quality and audio quality, we figured it was worth a try.  All of those positive reviews were accurate -- we are thrilled with this purchase.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great Little TV
Reviews.Author: Frequent Buyer
Reviews.Content: Super picture as others have described.  Very pleased with the picture quality.  Easy to set up and navigate through the menu options.  The default audio settings cause the speakers to sound tinny but are easily adjusted as described below.I dug into the audio capability because I planned to run the audio output into an external amplifier (or PC speakers).  Note that this TV has both an analog and a digital audio output jack.  I needed the analog output because my amplifier only takes analog inputs.  I avoided other HDTV's when they only had a digital audio output jack.The analog audio output sounds great.  If you choose to use the TV speakers you might want to modify the default audio settings through the Audio Menu options.  I'd recommend setting the SRS StudioSound HD to "Standard" vs. "Surround" and the SRS TruVolume to "Off".  Then go to the Equalizer Settings and adjust the 5 frequency bands to your liking.  I upped the bass range a little and turned down the treble.  Surround Sound from two small 5 Watt TV speakers isn't going to give you that thunderous theater experience so I opted to turn it off and use the Equalizer.For those that want to run the analog output to an external amplifier, this TV provides two options under the "Advanced Audio" menu selection.  The Analog Audio Output can be set to "Fixed" or "Variable".  Fixed sets the output levels to a constant value and the volume cannot be controlled through the TV remote but can be controlled from your amplifier remote.  Variable allows you to adjust the volume from the TV remote where the maximum output (100%) gives the volume set on the external amplifier.  The TV remote Mute function does not work in either of these modes.  It only works when the TV speakers are turned on.Only had the TV about a week but it's performing great.  I'll provide further updates if performance declines.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: GERALD BLAKE
Reviews.Content: TV is lightweight and has great color and sharpness. Easy to connect to the dish system. Up and watching in 5 min.

Reviews.Title: VERY HAPPY!
Reviews.Author: PoopiePants
Reviews.Content: When I came across this 24 inch t.v. for under $200 I wasn't expecting that it was going to be as good as it turned out. The picture quality is great and so is the quality of the sound. This is a great find, I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Vizio Worth Watching
Reviews.Author: Tweeters "L"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for an extra tv which is working great. Pictures are pretty clear and sound is good. Set up was easy and I was watching tv same evening. I did discover when hooking up my dvd player, there are not enough plugs to share with the satellite receiver. Over all, it's a great tv and fits perfectly in a den or bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Gizmo42
Reviews.Content: Bought one to replace my old 20" CRT tv in the bedroom. The size is perfect and picture is good as expected. One issue I've found is that the built in speakers are tinny so I hooked up a cheap computer 2.1 speaker set which sounds much better. But, the internal speaker on/off setting keeps turning back on whenever the tv is turned off. Will see if it keeps doing it after I get a new box with HDMI, I have it connected with component right now. My Vizio E371VL in the living room does not  have this issue but it's connected with HDMI.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, good price
Reviews.Author: The Pirate Flautist
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to replace an old living room TV. Item functions well and is easy to use. Looks great in the living room. It is used mostly by two older adults who are not tech savvy. They find it fairly easy to use and enjoy it.The only thing I don't like is the limited number of inputs. It's fine if you are using HDMI cords, but if you have an older DVD player or want to hook up a Wii system, then it doesn't work. Luckily, I had bought a Blu-ray player for my own TV so we use it in the living room.Overall, good basic TV for the price and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: No Complaints!
Reviews.Author: Jim8120
Reviews.Content: We live in an apartment and this Vizio 32-Inch TV is the perfect size for our living room.  It was so easy to set up, just unpack it, attach the stand with the 4 screws that's provided, plug it in, program it with one touch of a button, and that's it, just enjoy.  You can also mount it on the wall if you want to.  It has a good picture and great audio.  It has HDMI ports where you can hook up High-Def. DVD player and speakers.  You can also purchase a HDMI Cable from Amazon like I did which works GREAT! AmazonBasics High-Speed HDMI Cable (6.5 Feet/2.0 Meters) - Supports Ethernet, 3D, and Audio Return [Newest Standard].  We have had this TV for over a month now, and no complaints so far. I am very satisfied with this VIZIO TV!

Reviews.Title: Dear Vizio
Reviews.Author: Zach
Reviews.Content: Thank you for making an cheap 1080p HDTV that is actually really good. It's nice looking, very thin and perfect size (24in) for my room. However, I do wish that there was at least one more HDMI input, for now I must share the one with my cable box and my internet streamer. Oh well, it's probably worth more than it's price, so the only thing keeping me from giving this 5 stars is the amount of inputs.

Reviews.Title: lasted 3 weeks
Reviews.Author: dwight s marshall
Reviews.Content: i think vizio makes good lcd's BUT this is not one of them. it started flickering in 3 weeks.then the seller wouldn't even support it. because i had the tv over 15 days .after dealing with vizio tech support i found out this seller is NOT authorized vizio retailer.therefore the factory vizio warranty does not apply at all. so if YOUR vizio tv has troublelike mine. you will also be in my situation. (OUT OF LUCK)the ONLY AMAZON authorized retailer is  amazon LLC

Reviews.Title: Excellent if 60hz refresh rate is all you need
Reviews.Author: RSS
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant about buying this TV because it wasn't a major high quality brand name, but there were so many positive reviews that I decided to take a chance and am very glad I did.  First, let me explain the purpose of this TV.  My wife uses it to watch some of her favorite programs when she is on the treadmill in our basement, so there is no high speed action like some sporting events that appear blurred on a 60hz TV.  I would never consider a 60hz set for the main TV.  The description states that it receives in 720p.  I was pleasantly surprised to see that it received in up to 1080i.  You can see this because when you turn it on, it momentarily displays the signal it is receiving (e.g. std 480p, HD 720p, etc.).  The picture was very sharp, and the colors were very vivid right out of the box.  No adjustments were needed.  I highly recommend this set with the caveat above about high speed action.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Rottlover "... and booklover"
Reviews.Content: I was surprised at the light weight of this TV. I was replacing a similar sized LCD TV that weighs about 3x as much. I bought a bluray player to go with this, and it has one HDMI input for the bluray. However, I haven't yet upgraded my satellite receiver in that room to HD, and I'm concerned that the single HDMI input will need to be shared. I guess I'll find out later. The 3-color AV cables from my current satellite box weren't too easy to figure out because there are red and white inputs on the back of the TV, but not a yellow one for the video. I realized after studying the set-up guide that the left-most blue input is marked Y/V, so I tried plugging yellow into that. It works. The diagram in the set-up guide actually shows the 3-color AV cable being plugged into an input marked Y, but it's floated off the picture of the TV's back, maybe to indicate that these inputs don't actually exist on this TV. It was confusing. In any event, the high-def looks good from the blu-ray. The satellite box, of course, is only feeding standard def, but the colors and so forth are still crisp and the picture looks good. I'm happy with it so far, though 2 HDMI inputs would've been better than 1.

Reviews.Title: Replaced junk with scratched up junk
Reviews.Author: MOM A
Reviews.Content: Completely stopped working 6 months after purchase.  Went through a lot of hassle to convince customer service to cover shipping to and from for repair.  They returned a scratched up television to me.  Will not purchase Vizio again!

Reviews.Title: What a deal!
Reviews.Author: On the road
Reviews.Content: Bought it site unseen. Did not have on display (walmart)  so I got another 10% off, paying 250.00 and some change. The picture was super clear and that was with just an ANT! Have not hooked up Direct TV yet. It goes in my RV so the light weight, and low profile works great for me. Give it a shot at that price.

Reviews.Title: TV went black after a year and a half.
Reviews.Author: Gregory C. Wagner
Reviews.Content: Vizio's warranty is only good for a year.  A year and a half later the tv screen goes black and Vizio tells me it's a known problem that has to do with the power board or main board.  Vizio gave me a number to a repair facility to have it taken care of at my cost.  I can tell you I will be finding another tv brand from this point on as all of my tv's in the house have been Vizios.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV
Reviews.Author: Dawn Patterson
Reviews.Content: This tv was perfect for my daughter.  She was thrilled when she opened it on Christmas and it fits perfectly in her bedroom.  Not too huge yet not too small.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: bengalsreds20
Reviews.Content: VIZIO E240AR 24-Inch 60Hz LED LCD Class Edge Lit Razor HDTV (Black)I already own a 32 inch for myself and decided to get my parents a 24 inch, very satisfied with the picture of the TV.  It's a great little tv for a bedroom and Vizio is a great brand, haven't had any problems with the one I own the new one looks just as good.Edit: They actually have used the tv now, the sound is way better than expected for a 24 inch.  Also it's very easy to set up, took 10 minutes at most to scan for all the channels and configure all the other settings.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Phylca
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my home office, and this size is perfect for a small- to medium-size room.  It was easy to set up.  Picture quality is excellent, and so is the sound.  I was particularly concerned about the sound quality because so many smaller flat screens are reviewed as having a "tinny" sound or volume not loud enough; however, I am definitely not disappointed with this TV. Also, the shipping time was super because I received the TV a few days after I ordered it.

Reviews.Title: Darrel  Vizio TV
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I purchased this 24"  Tv about 3 weeks ago.  Great picture but the sound is like it is coming from a tin can. I would rate it as a 3 because of the very poor sound.

Reviews.Title: Crappy sound and dim picture
Reviews.Author: Mitchell Williams
Reviews.Content: The sound on this machine is terrible. It’s all muffled.  The picture is dim and slightly off color.  Too few hook ups and all in a bad place.

Reviews.Title: Vizio TV 24 - inch led-lcd
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: Works great! This is my 3rd tv by visio, and would buy another when needed.very easy to use also.

Reviews.Title: 3/5, because i should have known better
Reviews.Author: The Reverend A.J. Miller
Reviews.Content: first off, this review is for a USED/refurbished version of this product.i rarely buy used electrical merchandise, because i always seem to have issues.  the tv i received cosmetically looks great--if you took it out of the box and set it up, no one would know it had been used previously.when it is hooked up to my computer for use as a monitor, however, it has a tendency to vary brightness randomly, dimming and brightening according to who knows who's whim.hard to beat a 32" tv at the price i paid, though.i have another vizio tv (40"), which has worked flawlessly for more than 3 years of daily, 10+ hours/day use, which is why i decided to buy THIS tv.  got a great deal on a USED one, but i should have known better, and just sprung an extra $120 for a new duplicate of my larger vizio.update: also would like to add that the model i received does not seem to have function buttons of any kind on the actual tv.  you MUST have the remote to even turn the tv on.

Reviews.Title: Right size
Reviews.Author: Avid reader "BobbyC"
Reviews.Content: This replaced a smaller screen in my bedroom and is just right.  Together with the Sennheiser headphones, I am happy as I can be.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: thomas williams
Reviews.Content: Quality picture, easy set up and the sound is terrific for a small model.  Had a question about remote codes and had to call Vizio.  Rep picked up in three rings from a u.s. call center.  Very helpful.  Quite pleased and will consider Vizio again.

Reviews.Title: Visio is the best!
Reviews.Author: Salam K.Jawad
Reviews.Content: One you see it for the first time, you think it is very small, but when you get it you will change your mind. Visio has many properties to make it the best TV I ever had. I could use it with HDMI cable and watch anything online so I shouldn't pay extra bucks for digital TV. It is very good product.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat it for th $$$
Reviews.Author: Jamie "Jamie"
Reviews.Content: Great little TV.  I bought it to watch in fron of my treadmill and bike trainer. It makes the long runs and training rides inside in the winter less boring.  The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is because it could use some louder speakers. It is fine when I ride the bike but I have to put the volume up to 100% to just be able to hear it when using the treadmill.  I will probably get some external speakers for it next winter. I can't complain because it is plenty loud otherwise.  This TV will suit 90% of the people who buy it for what it is intended for. (bedroom, small office ect)

Reviews.Title: warranty void from the gitgo - not an approved Vizio reseller
Reviews.Author: Waicool
Reviews.Content: well well well, i just bought two of these vizio tv's and so far so good with the exception that one of them did not ship with the little screws that hold the plastic base on.  I called to Vizio and got great response until they looked up my invoice and told me they could NOT ship me the missing parts because ELECTRONICS101DEALS IS NOT AN AUTHORIZED VIZIO RESELLER. I will hopefully find a similar pair of screws to secure the base but owning these brand new TV's without a warranty is a dirty deal.  Lesson learned, verify you are buying from an authorized reseller.  ELECTRONICS191DEALS is not an authorized Vizio seller.

Reviews.Title: Super nice TV
Reviews.Author: R "RichL"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother as a Christmas gift and she has had no complaints. The picture is bright and clear and the sound is great.

Reviews.Title: Pretty nice
Reviews.Author: John H. Bakker "Steel Head Red"
Reviews.Content: Great TV. Picture is perfect except when viewed from a sharp angle where color washes out. Would be great for most rooms.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this purchase
Reviews.Author: Charles Windsor
Reviews.Content: Perfect for my application. Plenty of volume and a really good picture. Considering a second one for another room in the basement.

Reviews.Title: Nice Picture, horrible sound... Get the newer model for $20 more
Reviews.Author: Joseph Jenks "joe"
Reviews.Content: First and foremost, Amazon shipped fast, great job amazon! Ill sum this one up fast since its the older model. The picture quality is decent, but the sound is tinny and horrible. Plus the sound is projected out the back of the tv set. This set would be good for a traveling gamer who wants a small and light footprint. The remote is adequate. The USB port is just for pictures. No throwing your .avi, .mov, or .mp4 on a thumbdrive to watch a movie.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for home office
Reviews.Author: Edith Wright
Reviews.Content: For my home office, I wasn't looking for anything top-of-the-line, although I think I made a really good choice with this one.  The tv works perfectly and has a great picture for a really good price.  Also it has impressive sound for such a small tv that sounds as good as any full size tv in the living room - no tinny sounds.  Only thing would make it better would be more inputs on back for my old-school satellite box.  It has HDMI, co-ax, red/blue/green but no yellow/red/white (which is the one I need).  Even with worst connection (co-ax) still has good/clear picture and sound.  Also...crazy fast shipping....ordered late Wednesday evening, arrived via FedEx on Saturday with nothing extra paid - used free supersaver shipping...AWESOME!

Reviews.Title: Crisp Picture, Great Sound
Reviews.Author: Al B.
Reviews.Content: For the price, this TV is great. It is 1080p which I did not even realize when I bought it, I thought it was 720p.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: navy
Reviews.Content: Beautiful color n excellent sound for being little I definetly recommend and it was very affordable downfall is there is only 1 HDMI port but that is made up for by the 1080p picture quality its only rated at 720p but reaches the 1080p

Reviews.Title: This is my second vizio tv. I purchased a 32 inch 3 years ago.I have been very satisfied with it. And thought I would get the 24
Reviews.Author: J. Barr "book loving mom"
Reviews.Content: This is my second purchase of the Vizio brand tv. I purchased a 32 inch 3 years ago. I have been very happy with it. Excellent color quality and ease of set up. So when I saw this 24 inch was offered at an excellent price I couldn't pass it up.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Clarence
Reviews.Content: Just got this TV and was instantly impressed with the picture quality.  A couple of years ago you would have paid a fortune for a picture of this quality.  It is terrific!

Reviews.Title: Vizio does it again !
Reviews.Author: James A. McLane
Reviews.Content: We own 2 Vizio products, 32" & 36", and have been extremely satisfied with their performance, sound and picture. One is on satellite and the other on external antennaand it was our wish to replace an old 26" tv in our bedroom(with converter box). After checking many sites trying to find the "best" buy that I could. Spent many days (couple of weeks) checking on various sets and reading many reviews and came to the conclusion that we wanted a Vizio. One day rechecking Amazon up pops the 24" that fit our desires. Ordered same (Free shipping) and at this time no tax. Ordered 6 days before Christmas and due to the location of Amazon warehouse and shipping site, it arrived 2 days after order. Was set up within a short time, the majority of which was removal of old set (damn they are heavy and bulky). New set was installed quickly and in operation immediately. The picture is super, the sound is very good and it looks wonderful!

Reviews.Title: Impressed
Reviews.Author: JosephCa64 "MusicLover"
Reviews.Content: This is my first Vizio and before buying it I must admit I was bit wary. I have a 55 inch Samsung 3D, a 47 inch LG Insignia and I always had the perception of Vizio as being of a lesser quality. But, I needed a TV for the kitchen and there really are not all that many 22-24 inch TVs on Amazon, so I took a chance on this and was pleasantly surprised. It has a very clear, crisp vibrant picture, very rich color and sound is better than adequate(like most thin screens it lacks bass, but otherwise it has ample volume). And, despite some reviews I read on here, set up was  very easy. The channel scan does take a while, around 15 minutes I'd say, but I had no issues with missing channels. Really the only thing I briefly struggled with was attaching the bass stand, if you don't have a screw gun, a long thin Phillips screwdriver is best for that and I didn't have either! Otherwise I am impressed with this TV. And, for the price, I don't know that you'll do much better.

Reviews.Title: Quality picture
Reviews.Author: Marty T
Reviews.Content: We got this tv as a Christmas present for my Mother and the picture is just outstanding.Very vibrant and crisp.  Excellent purchase.

Reviews.Title: good set
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Steven Kargman"
Reviews.Content: typical of vizio - excellent picture, easy set up and audio you can actually hear & understand. it's a winner.

Reviews.Title: Surprise, Surprise!!
Reviews.Author: Quality Shopper
Reviews.Content: Received my American made TV today and couldn't be happier. Took 5 minutes to hook up. I have Direct TV so it was a breeze.I have 2 Sony's, 1 Samsung & 1 Dynex. Of all this is by far the best value.Picture is clear & colorful. I put on the lanai and I can see the picture nicely even with the reflection of the sun. I couldnt do that with the Samsung.This particular TV has no High Def so I chose the Panoramic setting. It is fine.Sound quality is very, very good. If it withstands the test of time I would say it will be one of my best value electronic purchases.Of course, the free delivery in 36 hours wasn't to shabby with Amazon Prime as well. Right to the Lanai from UPS and Voila.Port St Lucie, Florida

Reviews.Title: Great quality and value
Reviews.Author: Lisa Schulz
Reviews.Content: I originally bought this because a local repairman recommended Visio.  According to him it's the brand least likely to need repairs.We've had it two months and found it suprisingly good for the price.  Hooked up in just a few minutes, not a problem since.  The picture is crisp and clear, the sound more than sufficient (usually have to turn volume up to max on videos, not with this set).If you're looking for an upgrade to an older TV or just need another affordable set, you can't go wrong with this one.

Reviews.Title: 24 inch LED LCD Vizio Razor TV
Reviews.Author: A. Jones
Reviews.Content: Overall I like the TV but actual viewing part of the screen is small in my opinion.  In order to make it bigger with the menu settings, the picture looks very distorted and stretched out.

Reviews.Title: I Love this T.V.
Reviews.Author: Krisie
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time and easy to assemble. Great picture and sound quality. Speakers are in the back. Looks great in my kitchen. I Love it!!

Reviews.Title: Vizio Fan
Reviews.Author: Chuck "sj00884"
Reviews.Content: Have been a Vizio fan for years because of their reasonable cost and high performance. This LED model was perfect for daughter's dorm. Picture quality is first rate and sound quality, a weakness in most if not all brands, is fine for this application.

Reviews.Title: LOVE this TV.  picture qualifty is great.
Reviews.Author: nanacat
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my bedroom.  Picture qualityu is wonderful and the pricing was reasonable.  Availability was simple.I really love this TV.

Reviews.Title: Nice lightweight TV monitor
Reviews.Author: Carjones
Reviews.Content: Great display, easy to set-up and get working. Modern feel, thin and lightweightWe received this item in 48 hours-

Reviews.Title: Screen blacks out
Reviews.Author: MasonM
Reviews.Content: We've had this tv for just under a year, and didn't have any problems until a couple days ago. The screen will appear to turn on just to black out, again, while you can clearly tell that it is actually still on.

Reviews.Title: Audio Issues
Reviews.Author: ben lashaway
Reviews.Content: Boob tube is great!  You see them in all the bars and I have another identical one that is excellent.  Trouble with this one is the volume fluctuates when channels are changed or sometimes at random.  Just shipped it back free with a RMA so they will make sure it's right.  Great little tube in this era of disposable electronics.

Reviews.Title: ZIO E240AR 24-Inch 60Hz LED LCD Class Edge Lit Razor HDTV
Reviews.Author: Sue Turner "S.L. Turner"
Reviews.Content: As always, great customer service from Amazon. The TV, though leaves a bit to be desired. Picture clarity and sound are really good, but it responds very slowly. Takes a while for it to come on and even longer for the channels to change. Overall, I'm pleased. While I tend to be a bit impatient, it's not like there's a reason to be in such a great hurry!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: JMC
Reviews.Content: Great and great price. I bought it for the great reviews and the price. Also it did not require me having a hernia operation like my old conventional TV did.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the size and price
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for my bedroom.  It has been perfect!  Great sound and picture (the manufacturers' preset settings are  a bit off but adjust to your liking).  I have had it for about 16 months and no problems.

Reviews.Title: Great TV - BUT bad speakers
Reviews.Author: Lasse Grunewald
Reviews.Content: Great TV. Nice picture, very thin. BAD SOUND! BE aware. I bought speakers to hook up to it so I can enjoy movies etc.

Reviews.Title: perfect size for the bedroom
Reviews.Author: Kathleen McDermott
Reviews.Content: came early the next day.  Very clear picture and sound thinking about getting a new vizio for the living room and giving our son the old one in there now.

Reviews.Title: Great TV For the price
Reviews.Author: Aaron Harvey
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price. Picture and sound are very clear making it perfect for my dorm room. Only complaint is it only has the newest component input with 5 plug ins so the older red white and yellow plug ins seem to only play in black and white.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful TV for the Kids Room!
Reviews.Author: Aqua-nordic Design Service, Incorporated "Gun...
Reviews.Content: I installed this TV in my Granddaughters room and it is just perfect for her. The picture is really nice and bright and the sound although not outstounding is perfect in her small room!

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Nathan Sharkey
Reviews.Content: It has a great picture. The only complaint we have is the remote is hard to use and the buttons are already rubbing off after 7 months. The use issue is that when there is on menu up you can not control anything else until it goes away.For example if you change the volume up or down you have to wait for the volume bar to time out in order to change the channel. Kind of weird and annoying but not enough of an issue to lower my rating. I love this TV!

Reviews.Title: No Complaints!
Reviews.Author: Maria Cusumano
Reviews.Content: So this TV functions as our bedroom television. I had bought my boyfriend a blu-ray player and realized afterwards that his tube TV didn't have an HDMI port for it, so he decided it was time to upgrade his TV anyway and found this one. It was a good price and we've been using it for about a year now. I think all of our complaints while watching TV in the bedroom are all in regards to our iO service, but not the TV itself!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Julia Schedler
Reviews.Content: This TV is the perfect size for my room. I use it as a tv and an external monitor and am quite happy with it. My one complaint is that it only has one HDMI port, but that's not a huge deal.

Reviews.Title: For guest room, a perfect addition
Reviews.Author: Headphone junkie
Reviews.Content: Love this little TV. Best of all, I bought a $9 antenna from Amazon, hooked it up, and the darn thing pulls in all my locals in HD. Amazing. I never tried using an antenna before (Have directv but didn't want to add a box). Very nice picture, but as with most LCDs, you need to sit front and center (I am a plasma guy for main TV).

Reviews.Title: Quick, safe delivery
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Purchased for a small bedroom. Needed a bigger television because the cable guide was too small on the previous TV. Good size screen and good speakers. Usually the volume is set at 20 or lower. Perfect price.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Cognizant
Reviews.Content: use it as a spare room tv but I was surprised that the color is very good and the sound is decent.

Reviews.Title: Good Small TV
Reviews.Author: randoman73
Reviews.Content: Good For What It Is, An Entry Level Extra TV.  Works Well In My Kitchen, But Should Be Fine In A Small Bedroom Too.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: tk
Reviews.Content: a great tv.  It was easy set up and has fantastic sound and picture.  It was also very reasonalbly priced.

Reviews.Title: Good price; on time
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Moose
Reviews.Content: TV is fine. We have had no trouble.More words required: One two three four five six seven eight nine ten eleven twelve.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Value
Reviews.Author: Lex
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect TV for a small/dorm room, so no complaints there, because this is what I was looking for. Only issue i have with this TV is that "blacks" don't look consistently dark, if that make sense. Other than that, everything looks sharp! Delivery was pretty speedy as well!

Reviews.Title: Decent TV at a nice price
Reviews.Author: David B. Jennings
Reviews.Content: UPDATE: The TV failed after about three months (wouldn't power up). I returned it to Vizio for repair under warranty. I had to pay for shipping it to them, and shipping time was about a week. Vizio turned it around quickly (a day or two) and it took another week to get back to me. The TV worked, but it came back without the remote control! I called Vizio and they sent a remote (but no batteries). Shipping this took another week. I want to pass on a couple of things I learned. This is not in the "owners manual", but you can operate menu items with the buttons on the TV (you must do this to set up the TV for operation). Using the buttons on the TV, Channel +/- corresponds to menu up/down. Volume +/- corresponds to menu right/left. Input corresponds to "enter". Also, if you are the type to "look under the hood" to see if the problem is obvious and/or easily corrected, don't tell Vizio. They may claim that you performed an unauthorized repair and void your warranty. Honesty is not the best policy here!I bought this TV for a smaller bedroom, and it is the perfect size for this. It could also be a good kitchen TV.  It is thin and light and energy efficient.  Picture and sound are fine.  Basic setup is easy. One limitation that holds it back is that there is only one HDMI input.  While this is pretty common at this price point, there are choices that have more.  There is also a choice of component video and composite video, but you can only have one or the other.  I am also using an RF modulator with some older "legacy" devices.  Initially, I was getting "no signal" until I discovered that you must specify (or search) for TV channels (in this case, analog channel 3 for the RF modulator) to receive them.  So I added channel 3, problem solved!

The only very minor issue is the stand - seems a bit small & somewhat flimsy, making this TV just a little top-heavy & susceptible to accidental knockovers.  It is NOT unstable, though.  I have mine pushed up against the wall so no worries about that.  Maybe Vizio's market research showed a lot of people would mount this size TV on the wall.  I am extremely pleased with this purchase!  What a deal, compared to what the big box retailers were offering after the holidays.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: vizio 24-inch
Reviews.Author: Florida
Reviews.Content: It is exactly what I expected. Good picture and sound. This is the third Vizio I have purchased and have been happy with all them.

Reviews.Title: For less than $200 it is very hard to beat!
Reviews.Author: John I. Gonzales
Reviews.Content: I use this for my computer plus have Direct TV and a Bluray player hooked up to it. It works great for all 3 uses... and fits neatly on my desktop. The speakers sound pretty good..... especially compared to the typical speakers found on a basic computer monitor.I am very happy with this purchase... for $187 I have a TV that looks good, sounds good and is multitasking on my office needs! I feel like I got the best bang for the buck after looking at all the sub $200 TV's in this size class.One note, this TV only has one HDMI input... so if that is a consideration then look into that specification on any TVs that you are considering.Good luck with your purchase!

Reviews.Title: Vizio 24in TV great buy
Reviews.Author: Wayfinder
Reviews.Content: Like the TV it has great picture and sound, nice bright color.  The TV arrived on time and the packaging was good. I feel this is a great size for a small bedroom and works well for my needs. Would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality  for the price
Reviews.Author: Andrea Church "AC"
Reviews.Content: I bought the 24" version of this TV for my apartment. The picture quality of this TV blows me away! It's incredibly sharp with excellent color. The sound quality is much better than my older Vizio which sounds tinny in comparison. I do find the sound on this newer TV a little loud however but I haven't had the chance to tweak it yet. The menu is very easy to use with several customizable settings and I was up and running with an HDMI connection in a couple minutes. One nice feature is that you can turn off the speakers via the menu. I have headphones that I use when watching TV so it's easy to shut off the external speakers for headphone use but you can turn the speakers back on via the menu in just a couple seconds--no need to remove the headphones from the jack.Pros:Excellent picture quality and sharpnessEasy to use menu systemGood soundThin profileReasonable price--a bargain for the qualityCons:Very lightweight so you really need a stable table/cart to set it onHas that yucky sweet electronic plastic smell--it's not overpowering but it's there--I'm sure it will lessen over time.Limited amount of connections on the back

Reviews.Title: Vizio RAZOR 24" LED TV
Reviews.Author: Barney  Evangelista
Reviews.Content: This is our 2nd Vizio TV and was purchased for viewing in the kitchen areas.  The value and performance of these products keep us as loyal Vizio customers when in the market for HD TVs ..  This TV is light weight, easy to set up, and performs with the quality of the more expensive TVs on the market.

Reviews.Title: Like this television but.............
Reviews.Author: meemee39
Reviews.Content: Really like the picture, color and sound on my new Vizio 24" television but just realized that if I want to watch it on normal viewing rather than wide, zoom or stretch the picture is only 15" wide.  I will keep this tvbut when buying more I will take that into account when deciding how wide I want the picture to be when on the normal setting.

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy
Reviews.Author: Steven Osmun
Reviews.Content: The price is the only good thing about this TV.  I bought it for my parents as a present.  They used it for 2 weeks before the problems began.  The volume started changing on its own and the picture turned green.  I bought this TV because the reviews said it had loud speakers which is true.  The problem is you want to be able to choose when its loud, in this case the TV gets to decide.  I read a few reviews that had the same problem and I was worried this may happen and it did.  THis is the first Vizio I have ever bought and will never buy one again.  If multiple people had this problem it shows me the company isn't concerned with removing defective products from circulation.  I returned it for a refund and will buy a Samsung or LG like I was going to originally.  This is what happens when you try to save money, you get junk.

Reviews.Title: poor picture
Reviews.Author: john mcdonald
Reviews.Content: got this for my kitchen,, but when mounted i found it to have a very poor color ,,,souind was ok,,, returned it and went with samsung

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: If you are like me and just want a good tv, then this one is perfect There isn't any fancy netflix, or youtube crap on it (that's what my xbox is for anyway)Looks sexy, GREAT picture, GREAT sound for a tv. It's 720p which is amazing i see no need for anything more than that. The picture has loads of setting but i just put it on the movie preset and it was good to go. sound has an EQ..This is my fist new/hi def tv and i couldn't be happier. Quality product for an almost unbeatable price

Reviews.Title: TV is AMAZING!!!
Reviews.Author: Christina
Reviews.Content: This tv was really easy to put together and also easy to set up.  The picture quality is great, but what has really impressed me is the sound quality.  This tv is set in the back corner of my bedroom and the sound that comes out of it makes me feel like I'm right next to the tv.  Unlike other HDTVs the volume only has to be on 10/50 for this effect!  Great quality tv for the money!

Reviews.Title: Cheap, Decent picture, Good sound
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Slatton
Reviews.Content: I was worried about the sound based on some other reviews but have found the sound to be more than satisfactory.  Actually, I'm quite pleased.  The colors are a little "off" out of the box and require some fiddling.  Sharpness and clarity is outstanding.  My only complaint in the screen category is the readability of the channel numbers, info, etc. on the screen.  If you're sitting more than 8 feet away, it's very difficult to see what channel you're actually on.  Minor but annoying none-the-less.  I tried to find a setting to fix this but was unable to.For the price, a very good product that I'd recommend for small rooms.

Reviews.Title: Good basic TV
Reviews.Author: G
Reviews.Content: Good picture. Good sound.  Good deal considering it's under two hundred.  Just know that it doesn't have a lot of inputs.  I mean number of inputs... it supports a lot of types.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture
Reviews.Author: peabug
Reviews.Content: Nice size.  Long delay when changing channels.  The remote is hard to read without my glasses on, it is hard to tell which side is up.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E240AR 24-Inch 60Hz LED LCD Class Edge Lit Razor HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Jaylow
Reviews.Content: This little guy rocks. for a smaller tv the clarity actually amaze me. It has great sound quality and for the price you can do no wrong with this little VIZIO.

Reviews.Title: Wobbly base
Reviews.Author: LANA D KITTO
Reviews.Content: I may be missing some parts, or got the wrong base for the unit but it is dangerously wobbly. I purchased this for the kids WII and it's size is great, but the base it s big problem.

Reviews.Title: Recommended
Reviews.Author: Robert G. Shaw
Reviews.Content: I bought this Vizio refurbished for $118. The picture is bright and sharp. I like having the USB and VGA inputs. Way out in the country, I'm pulling in several very clear channels using just rabbit ears with a small antenna amplifier. Recommended, if you are looking for a TV in this class.

Reviews.Title: bueno
Reviews.Author: hector villamil
Reviews.Content: el producto es bueno, es recomendado, practico y de facil uso, la imagen es muy buena, el precio es bueno

Reviews.Title: BUY A LARGER SIZE THAN..
Reviews.Author: IRA FELDMAN
Reviews.Content: A LOT SMALLER SCREEN THAN I THOUGHT. IT SEEMS LIKE THE HIGHT IS THE SAME FOR ALL SIZES; ONLY THE WIDTH CHANGED TO MAKE IT SEEM BIGGER. BUY A SIZE OR TWO LARGER THAN YOU THINK YOU NEED. OTHERWISE WORKS GREAT.

Reviews.Title: Flat screen tv
Reviews.Author: stephen holmes
Reviews.Content: It was quite nice but a lot smaller than we had imagined.I expected the picture to be a lot clearer.

Reviews.Title: my new tv
Reviews.Author: skigal
Reviews.Content: Just installed in my VT home.  Have not tried it yet because not yet hooked up to cable.  Perhaps next week.

Reviews.Title: Everything i could have asked for! Picture is HD sound is HD and can get LOUD!
Reviews.Author: MAKAVELI
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv! its not too small either..i can get 1080p on my ps3!!VIZIO IS THE STUFF!!

Reviews.Title: Beware!
Reviews.Author: lattelover "MR1964"
Reviews.Content: Sending back the second VIZIO tv. Both have a green tint to the picture, and can not be adjusted. Giving up, and sending it back. Will wait and buy after the holidays from a local store. Not sure if either one was even new, or refurbished.

Reviews.Title: Sound stopped working after 2 weeks
Reviews.Author: nancy ann banfield
Reviews.Content: This was a ok tv for the kitchen , but after week 1 the sound started going up and down on it's own. A couple of days later, no sound at all.  Amazon is great for returns, and all, but I will never buy another VIZIO again.  I should have stayed with Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: patricia morris
Reviews.Content: Have not unpacked it... It was a good price exttra tv. Got here fast.  have to get cable hook up but sure it will be fine

Reviews.Title: So far, so good!
Reviews.Author: jilliej
Reviews.Content: Good picture, good sound.  This is a secondary set to my Sony so I don't put it through the ringer, just watch a bit in the morning so as long as it turns on, I'm happy.  Picture is good.  I think the color controls could be easier to work with but overall am pleased.

Reviews.Title: watchsalotoftv
Reviews.Author: Linda Williams
Reviews.Content: This TV was delivered quickly. However, the delivery person left it in a puddle of water on my front porch. Fortunately, the TV didn't get wet but the box did. The TV was easy to set up once I figured out how the stand went on. The picture adjustments were not so easy. It looked like a cartoon with luridly bright color hues and almost outlining the figures. The sound volume is a nightmare. It's difficult to control particularly after being muted and frequently radically changes volume on its own. I'm not going to return it because it's too much trouble and the box is ruined. I'll try and work on the sound issues with VIZIO. Oh, and you can only turn it on/off with the remote.

Reviews.Title: Meh...it's all right, I guess.
Reviews.Author: A. Young
Reviews.Content: The remote doesn't have a 'sleep/timer' feature which I find annoying.  If this is important to you, take note.There is no Owner's Manual included (just a flimsy setup guide)...you have to download the manual and print it out yourself.  I find this kinda Cheezy.The 'method' in which you screw the base on to the bottom of the screen for initial assembly is very badly engineered.  I thought I would have to put the thing down and go out and buy a teeny magnetic screwdriver but after 25 minutes I finally got it screwed on.The whole affair is *very* lightweight, and the base is Not Large, so I feel like I could brush up against it accidently (at night; it's a bedroom tv) and knock it off the table.  A bigger base would make it more stable.Something is wrong with the sound on my set.  Sometimes (more than once an hour) it 'fades' perceptibly (not completely, but enough so you notice) for a couple-five seconds, then returns to volume.  This happens consistently on both DVDs and network television, so it's not the antenna OR the DVD ancillary but rather the set itself.The picture is GREAT, even working off of the cheapest of antenna.However, the size of the 'picture' varies unpredictably depending on what channel or what *show* on a channel or which DVD is playing. But probably this is an 'input thang' not a 'TV thang.'On the whole, it is ok for the price.  Except for the sound problem.

Reviews.Title: Not good advertising
Reviews.Author: jenny
Reviews.Content: Not a proper desciption in the write up.  It's not a 1080 and should state so.  Disappointed, but my mistake for ordering without confirming.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Nom De Plum
Reviews.Content: I have only had this TV three weeksLet me tell you I love, love, love the aesthetic design of this set. Unfortunately it has been nothing but problems since day one. There is a photo mode on this TV which week one I accidentally went into and then when I went to change the input back to what I had it on the TV would only show in black in white. Fast forward two weeks later, my roommate figures out that you have to actually press the exit button to back out of the Photo Mode because otherwise the programming still thinks it is in that mode. The set has some sort of build in auto tuner for ambient lighting and the picture flickered so much that I had to turn this feature off. In fact I turned all of these features off and it still flickers (just not as bad). I contacted Vizio because I bought it directly from them and they would not help me via email. They said that I had to call customer service. Well yeah right. From the horror stories I have read online, no thanks. I have it to a point where its watchable and the flickering is only a minor annoyance but for a tv that's only three weeks old this is pretty much unacceptable. Word to the wise, don't buy from Vizio; this company is no longer what it was.

Reviews.Content: I am not able to rate because it was bought as a gift and do not know if the recipient likes it.

Reviews.Content: You want a 24 inch TV then this is the tv for you. It to be LED then this is still the TV for you. Want to avoid the high priced fake 350 dollar 24 inch tv in afghanistan. Then this TV is definitely the TV you're looking for and for 25 extra bucks buy a wall mount that will fit on you're wall presto now you have a wall mounted TV. Want a remote, no worries it comes with one. oh goodie it also comes with a wall plug.Enjoy.

Reviews.Title: It's only slightly less than wonderful (with apologies to Fats Waller!)
Reviews.Author: jarek00001
Reviews.Content: One week ago (11/26/12) I submitted a review of a Vizio E240AR 24" TV to Walmart.com; my review is reproduced below in its entirety. To date, my review has not seen the light of day on Walmart.com's website, which occasions this re-posting.If one simply ignores comments concerning Walmart and its return policies, the take-home message is that the TV set I received was not worth keeping due to inferior picture quality. Since most online user reviews of this particular TV set seem to be overwhelmingly positive, I consider it worthwhile to express a minority opinion.* * *The Vizio E240AR TV was delivered to our door by Walmart at no cost to us. The good news ends there.Vizio E240AR proved to be difficult to set up; I had to perform a full channel search twice since the program missed the ONE channel (DirecTV) that supplies programming via cable. Picture quality is JUST AWFUL; after spending the balance of the day trying to adjust the picture quality, which included a lengthy discussion with one of Vizio's technical assistants, I simply gave up. Colors are washed out; furthermore, the picture quality varies from channel to channel, and each requires readjustment, a task for which I have neither patience nor interest.At the time I purchased the set I applied for a Walmart Discover credit card, so the invoice was paid on that card. Trouble is, at that time Walmart.com simply assigned a temporary card number and provided only the last 4 digits. I won't know my complete credit card number until I physically receive the card in the mail. This point was never brought to my attention when I placed the order, but it became vitally important when I attempted to return the TV to my local brick-and-mortar Walmart store. Without the COMPLETE credit card number Walmart will NOT issue a refund in any other form than store credit, thereby locking me into ca. $200 worth of future Walmart purchases! Thanks, but no thanks!I refused this gambit; the option I have chosen to exercise is to sit on the TV for a week or 10 days until the credit card arrives in the mail, at which point I'm outta  there. The bottom line: If you purchase an item from Walmart on their brand new credit card, you should be aware that the return process is not quite as simple as advertised.So, let's summarize the outcome of this transaction in terms of win/lose:(i) Walmart sold a substandard product and delivered it to my door via FedEx at their expense. They lose the cost of shipping. Furthermore, the manner in which they chose to exercise their return policy has cost them customer confidence (if that ever meant anything to them in the first place). If you've ever returned an item to amazon.com you'll most likely understand the source of my pique with Walmart and their self-serving policy.(ii) When the customer attempted to return the item to a local Walmart store, I was given a runaround that required phone calls to walmart.com with infinite hold periods and ultimate refusal to release credit card information by either telephone or e-mail. Customer loses time and patience and is stuck holding the defective product for another week or so, at which time the issue HOPEFULLY will be resolved to the customer's satisfaction.(UPDATE: This issue subsequently was resolved the day after I received the actual credit card in the mail, when I returned the TV set to a local brick-and-mortar Walmart store.)(iii) The TV manufacturer (Vizio) gets a negative review of their product; I can't really chalk this up in the "win" column for Mr. Vizio, either.So, on a "win/lose" basis, this experience has proved to be a "lose" transaction from the standpoint of the manufacturer, the retailer, and the customer.Will someone please tell me why all three parties would subject themselves to a scenario that NO ONE can win? Beats me, and I shall take pains to ensure that I'm never again put in this position.

Reviews.Title: Beware it is 720P

Reviews.Content: Got the TV in good shape, didn't open the box since it said 720P on the cover and was expecting and HD TV (oops).  Wanted a 1080P for computer monitor.  Will see if the return works out or if they will make me pay for not reading into their description what was missing.
